# KAMONOHASHI CLI

A command line interface to KAMONOHASHI. The kamonohashi-cli works on Python versions:
* 2.7.9 and greater
* 3.5.x and greater

## Installation

To install kamonohashi-cli use pip:

```bash
$ pip install kamonohashi-cli
```

## Usage

```bash
$ kqi [ options ] COMMAND [ args ]...
```
